ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/finalized/.test(baseUrl)){
	workid = String(java.getString("$.list[1].data.todayWorksIds[*]")).split("
");
	
	body = {
  "variables": {
    "worksIds": workid
  },
  "query": "
          query getWorksList($worksIds: [ID!]) {
            worksList(worksIds: $worksIds) {
              
                  id
                  
    id
    isOrigin
    isEssay
    
    title
    cover(useSmall: false)
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel(preferVip: false)
  
    
  url
  title

    
  author {
    name
    url
  }
  origAuthor {
    name
    url
  }
  translator {
    name
    url
  }

    
  abstract
  authorHighlight
  editorHighlight

    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      inLibraryCount
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
    isColumn
    isFinished
  
  
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks @include(if: false) {
      
    ... on EbookWorks {
      book {
        url
        averageRating
        ratingCount
      }
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        tags {
          id
          name
          url
        }
      }
    }
  
    
  ... on WorksBase {
    copyrightInfo {
      newlyAdapted
      newlyPublished
      adaptedName
      publishedName
    }
  }

    
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        fandoms {
          title
          url
        }
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        kudoCount
      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}
headers={}

function getFree(headers){
	url = "https://read.douban.com/j/graphql",
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":body
		}
		if(headers)option["headers"]=headers;
		url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option)
   return	java.ajax(url);
}

if(/ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€å¼‚å¸¸/.test(result)){
	x = result.match(/Ark.CSRF_TOKEN = '([^']+)'/)[1];

	}
	result

exploreRule.bookList:
<js>
if(/finalized/.test(baseUrl)){
	workid = String(java.getString("$.list[1].data.todayWorksIds[*]")).split("
");
	
	body = {
  "variables": {
    "worksIds": workid
  },
  "query": "
          query getWorksList($worksIds: [ID!]) {
            worksList(worksIds: $worksIds) {
              
                  id
                  
    id
    isOrigin
    isEssay
    
    title
    cover(useSmall: false)
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel(preferVip: false)
  
    
  url
  title

    
  author {
    name
    url
  }
  origAuthor {
    name
    url
  }
  translator {
    name
    url
  }

    
  abstract
  authorHighlight
  editorHighlight

    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      inLibraryCount
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
    isColumn
    isFinished
  
  
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks @include(if: false) {
      
    ... on EbookWorks {
      book {
        url
        averageRating
        ratingCount
      }
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        tags {
          id
          name
          url
        }
      }
    }
  
    
  ... on WorksBase {
    copyrightInfo {
      newlyAdapted
      newlyPublished
      adaptedName
      publishedName
    }
  }

    
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        fandoms {
          title
          url
        }
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        kudoCount
      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}
headers={}

function getFree(headers){
	url = "https://read.douban.com/j/graphql",
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":body
		}
		if(headers)option["headers"]=headers;
		url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option)
   return	java.ajax(url);
}
result = getFree(headers);
if(/ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€å¼‚å¸¸/.test(result)){
	x = result.match(/Ark.CSRF_TOKEN = '([^']+)'/)[1];
	headers["x-csrf-token"] = x;
	result = getFree(headers);
	}
	}
	result
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let pages = Array.from(java.getStringList('option@value', null, true));

var chapters = java.ajaxAll(pages).flatMap(m => {
    let chapterLists = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(m.body()).select('.section-list');
    return Array.from(chapterLists.get(1).select('a'));
});

var list = chapters.map((item, i) => {
    let url = String(item.attr('href'));
    if (!url) {
        let thUrl = i < chapters.length - 1 ? chapters[i+1].attr('href') : chapters[i-1].attr('href');
        let ruleStr = i < chapters.length - 1 ? "#prev_url@href" : "#next_url@href";
       if (String(thUrl)) url = "data:;base64," + java.base64Encode(ruleStr + "|" + thUrl) + ',{"type": "chapter"}';
    }
    //java.log(url)
    return { 
        name: item.text(), 
        Url: url
    };
});
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('data')) {
    let decodedData = String(java.hexDecodeToString(src));
    let [ruleStr, initialUrl] = decodedData.split('|');
    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;
    while (initialCount < finalCount) {
            initialCount++;
            let Content = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
            let thUrl = java.getString(ruleStr, Content);
            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }
    result = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
    java.setContent(result);
}
result;
</js>
#content > :not(a)@html

    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;

            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }

    java.setContent(result);
}
result;

<js>
if(/"\/get-page-next\?"/.test(String(result))){
url = "https://www.damixs.co/get-page-next?"+Math.random();

post = result.match(/data: {'v1':'([^']+)','v2':'([^']+)','v3':'([^']+)','v4':'([^']+)'},/);

body ="v1="+java.encodeURI(post[1])+"&v2="+java.encodeURI(post[2])+"&v3="+java.encodeURI(post[3])+"&v4="+java.encodeURI(post[4]);

option = {
	"method":"POST",
	"body":body
	}
	j = java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))

JSON.parse(j).url.replace(/\s+/g,'+')
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
id = result.match(/<div id=\"(.*?)\" class=\"RBGsectionThree-content\">/)[1]
java.log(id)
var reg = "\\('\\#"+ id + "'\\)\\.html\\(d\\("+'\\"(.*)\\"' + "\\)\\);"
jm=result.match(reg)[1];
jms=jm.split("\", \"");
keyiv=java.md5Encode(jms[1]);
key=String(keyiv).substring(16);
iv=String(keyiv).substring(0,16);
java.aesBase64DecodeToString(jms[0],key,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",iv)
</js>

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]

	}))

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var r1=java.getString(".list3.0@html",src)
var r3=java.getString(".list3.1@html",src)
var callback=src.match(/var callback\='(.*)';/)[1];
var book_id=src.match(/load_more\('(\d+)'\)/)[1];
var callback_base64= base64(callback)
var head = JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
"Referer": "https://www.quanben.io/n/wodenushen/list.html"
  }
});
var url="https://www.quanben.io/index.php?c=book&a=list.jsonp&callback="+callback+"&book_id="+book_id+"&b="+callback_base64+","+head
var url_src=java.ajax(url)
//java.log(url_src)
var url_src_match=`${callback}\((.*)\)`
java.log(url_src_match)
var url_src_json=url_src.match(url_src_match)[1];
url_src_json1=url_src_json.match(/\((.*)\)/)[1];
//java.log(url_src_json1)
var url_src_json_data = JSON.parse(url_src_json1);
var r2=url_src_json_data.content
var r=r1+r2+r3
//java.log(r)
//java.log(JSON.stringify(url_src_json_data))
r;
</js>
.list3@li@a
